prompts: Create a colorful butterfly Pokemon that flutters gracefully through the meadows.
I want a Pokemon that can camouflage with flowers and has vibrant wings.
Generate a bug-type Pokemon with unique patterns on its wings and a friendly demeanor.
Make a fairy-like Pokemon that enjoys sunny days and loves to dance in the air.
Imagine a Pokemon that can change its colors based on the environment and has delicate antennae.
Design a lightweight Pokemon that gracefully glides above forests and fields.
Show me a Pokemon that represents beauty and has a joyful personality, with shimmering wings.
